## lab mr note

Add a note or comment to an MR on GitLab

### Synopsis

Add a note or comment to an MR on GitLab

```
lab mr note [remote] <id> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for note
  -m, --message strings   Use the given <msg>; multiple -m are concatenated as separate paragraphs
```
